newsitem.title: CANADA: Foreigners sell Canadian securities in June.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners sell Canadian securities in June.

text.p: Foreign investors sold a net C$2.01 billion of Canadian securities in June, after buying a net C$1.85 billion in May (revised from sales of C$168 million), Statistics Canada said on Thursday.
Canadian residents bought a net C$393 million of foreign securities after sellling C$292 million in May (revised from sales of C$2.40 billion).
